Congratulations Behaviour you ruined your game during the last 3 Months,

Implemented SBMM
Only counts Kills / Escapes which rewards selfish playstyle for Survivors and a Boring Killer one, used to work with Objectives

Hit Validation
Has been bugged for the last Months, why bother fixing it, if it only affects killers. You think you hit someone because your screeen is full of blood and the survivor screamed but jokes on you, you didnt.- Get validated.

High MMR
At Higher MMR literally every Survivor runs the same 10 Meta Perks, brings OP Items and annoying map offerings, which becomes really stall after a while.

Cheaters and Lag Switchers
They have become a lot more frequent, ingame reports do literally nothing.

NFTs and Licence
Pinheads best voiceline has been removed from the game along with the Stranger Things chapter from the store.

Perks
Almost 200 perks, yet you only see the same ones over and over again , because most of them are just underperforming or literally garbage.

Update Frequency
Not sure if lazy, incompetent or if they dont care anymore. We had one good update in the last 6 months and still they changed only a handfull of perks in this one. Oh Look 70mb update but guess what 30GB needs to be installed again

Events
Currently the Winter event is going on but yet again nobody cares about killers, since only survivors get to have fun in this one. A lot of previous events have been really boring aswell basically just copy pasta from the last ones

The Grind
Im almost at 1000 Hours and only have a handfull of Killers and 1 Survivor with most perks unlocked.

Clunky Menu
Cant search for perks, cant create item sets, cant switch Missions in Lobby, cant equip Killer and Survivor Missions at the same time. No ingame info over current mission status. cant see other survivors build.

IP-Adress Leaks and DDos
No official statement or active measures since November
This Game could be SO SO much better, if they only tried, they have all the options available why are they having so many partners and Fog whisperers if they dont ask them for their opinions. This game needs atleast 1 FULL MONTH OF FIXING.
But at this point its only dreaming.I could probably come up with more but im writing this one for around 30 minutes already. Well, uninstalled, maybe Santa brings a big update for christmas.

Edit - Recent Updates

1.Part Midchapter Update
2.Part Midchapter Update

Since this review has gotten alot of attention and it might have send the wrong message to some people im going to have to clarify myself,

This game is not total gargabe, someone who hasnt played DBD yet , will probably have alot of fun especially with some friends , just like I did, so please try it out.However, when you play this game alot and encounter many flaws, bugs and other negative aspects, which just keeps adding up and you fairly well know that those wont get fixed in the near future, because the development team is really slow, it just gets very frustrating and kills your joy and enthusiasm to continue playing this game.

Goodbye Bubba masks

#Discussions_QuoteBlock_Author
LEATHERFACE MASKS

Before we dive into the fun stuff, we want to address a serious topic.

For those who may not know, The Cannibal can unlock the faces of the four original Survivors by sacrificing them 25 times.

Members of the community have shared their experiences with people targeting and harassing them while using some of these masks. These reports were disheartening to hear, and we absolutely condemn this behaviour. We are not comfortable having these masks in the game when they are used as a tool to spread hate. To that end, we will be removing The Cannibalâ€™s unlockable faces in this upcoming Mid-Chapter.

Anyone who has ever played The Cannibal by the release of the Mid-Chapter update will be awarded 6,000 Iridescent Shards to compensate for their removal.

We will not tolerate hateful activity and will continue to take every step necessary to protect the community.

Dont buy this game and or spend money on ingame cosmetics/Killers

the game is really good in my opinion. the gameplay is easy to understand but hard to master (vaults, pallet throws etc), the "teams" are pretty balanced and the overall experience is great. there are some players that use unwanted tactics like camping , tunneling and downing everyone but this is not the game's fault. the community is pretty good and although you can buy skins etc it doesnt influence the game itself (not a pay to win game). I also enjoy that the developers give you point rewards and that you can buy some skins without spending real money. Overall i really enjoy playing this game and i recomend it (especially if you find it on sales).
